SELECT TOT.* FROM ( SELECT CU2.user_name AS reg_user_name , CC.customer_name AS project_customer_name , TRIM(CD.dept_name) AS dept_name , CU.user_id AS manager_id , CU.user_name AS manager_name , CU.user_tel AS manager_tel , CU.user_tel_ex AS manager_tel_ex , CU.user_phone AS manager_phone , SUM(IFNULL(OA.pv_cnt, 0)) AS pv_cnt , OP.project_box_id , OP.project_name , OP.project_alias , OP.delete_flag , OP.program_seq , OPJ.project_id , OPJ.cloud_id , IFNULL(CD2.dept_name,'-') AS dept_name2 FROM oss_project_box OP INNER JOIN oss_project OPJ ON OP.project_box_id = OPJ.project_box_id INNER JOIN oss_project_manager OPM ON OP.project_box_id = OPM.project_id LEFT JOIN cmm_user CU ON OPM.manager_id=CU.user_id LEFT JOIN cmm_user CU2 ON OP.reg_user_id=CU2.user_id LEFT JOIN cmm_customer CC ON OP.customer_id = CC.customer_id LEFT JOIN cmm_department CD ON OP.dept_code = CD.dept_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS pv_cnt FROM oss_nas onas INNER JOIN oss_nas_app ona ON onas.nas_id = ona.nas_id WHERE ona.del_flag = 'N' AND nas_type ='PV' GROUP BY project_id ) OA ON OPJ.project_id = OA.project_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dept_code , SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(dept_name), ' / ') AS dept_name , TRIM(dept_name) AS dept_name_only FROM cmm_department WHERE del_flag != 'Y' START WITH up_code IS null CONNECT BY PRIOR dept_code=up_code ORDER SIBLINGS BY dept_code) CD2 ON CD2.dept_code = CU.dept_code WHERE OP.delete_flag != 'Y' GROUP BY OP.project_box_id, OPM.manager_id ) TOT WHERE 1=1
AND (TOT.manager_id = #{userId} OR TOT.project_manager_id = #{userId})
AND ( TOT.project_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR TOT.project_alias like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )
AND TOT.project_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND TOT.project_alias like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
GROUP BY TOT.project_box_id
LIMIT #{start}, #{length}

SELECT onas.* , op.project_alias , DATE_FORMAT(onas.reg_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS regDatetime2 , DATE_FORMAT(onas.create_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS create_datetime2 , oc.cloud_type AS cloud_type , oc.cloud_id AS cloud_id , oc.cloud_name AS cloud_name , bop.amount , nasvm.nas_vm_list , nasvm.hostname_alias , nasvm.nas_vm_server , nasvm.nas_vm_ip , op.env_type FROM oss_nas onas LEFT OUTER JOIN bss_order_product bop ON onas.order_product_seq = bop.order_product_seq
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select ORDNASVMSUB.nas_vm_server as nas_vm_list , ORDNASVMSUB.order_product_seq , OVLIST.hostname_alias , ORDNASVMSUB.nas_vm_server , ORDNASVMSUB.nas_vm_ip from bss_order_product_nas_vm ORDNASVMSUB LEFT JOIN oss_vm OVLIST ON ORDNASVMSUB.vm_uuid = OVLIST.vm_uuid LEFT JOIN bss_order_product PRD ON ORDNASVMSUB.order_product_seq = PRD.order_product_seq ) nasvm ON nasvm.order_product_seq = onas.order_product_seq
INNER JOIN oss_project op ON onas.project_id = op.project_id
INNER JOIN oss_cloud oc ON op.cloud_id = oc.cloud_id
WHERE 1=1 AND op.project_box_id = #{projectBoxId} AND onas.del_flag = 'N' AND onas.nas_type ='PV'
AND ( nas_alias like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR nas_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )
AND ${searchKind} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY onas.nas_alias asc
LIMIT #{start}, #{length}

SELECT onas.nas_id, onas.project_id, op.project_name, onas.nas_name, onas.nas_alias, onas.nas_gb, onas.nas_file_system_path, onas.pv_name, onas.pvc_name, onas.connect_status, ona.app_uid, ona.mount_path, oa.app_name, oa.app_name_space FROM oss_nas onas LEFT JOIN oss_nas_app ona ON onas.nas_id = ona.nas_id INNER JOIN oss_app oa ON ona.app_uid = oa.app_uid LEFT JOIN oss_project op ON onas.project_id = op.project_id WHERE onas.nas_id = #{nasId}
